texts.t: The mouse can switch places with the selected animal.
Other animals can move through the ghost.
Two cheetahs can be moved on the same turn.
When you make a combo, lions will devour any naighboring animals.
When they arrive on the board, sheep will try to land near other sheep.
At the end of a move, gnu will attract any other gnu in their line of sight.
If you make a combo with squirrels, you can play again immediately!
Every elephant counts for two animals!
When you make a koala combo, only one animal is added to the board.
When you line up 4 or more hyenas, you can play again immediately.
The bear can devour a targeted animal.
When involved in a combo, the chicken leaves a surprise egg behind.
At the end of the move, a neighboring animal is transformed into a piouz.
When it arrives on the board, a hippo crushes an animal already on the board.
Frogs can combine even if they're not lined up straight.
At the end of a move, the chameleon transforms into a neighboring animal
When involved in a combo, the snake devours all animals within range
Only 3 pandas are required to make a combo!
